attributes.action: Award all frontline medical staff who are fighting the Coronavirus Pandemic.
attributes.additional_details: I want the Government to publicly acknowledge the people who are working to help save lives whilst risking their own. To acknowledge their bravery, their stories, their commitment in such difficult times.
attributes.background: I would like the Government to publicly award all frontline medical staff by name, who have fought or who are currently fighting the Coronavirus Pandemic and risking their lives everyday to overcome this disease. We owe them our lives.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560402
